alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 1:56PM EDT until June 11 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Central Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Bank, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Dentsville, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Villages at Sandhill, Columbia International University, Killian, Harbison State Forest and Riverbanks Zoo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 47 and 82. Interstate 26 between mile markers 99 and 117. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Murray move away from the water and take shelter!
